3. Use strong passwords: Always use a strong password for your social media accounts and change them regularly. Use a password manager to help you remember multiple passwords. 

4. Be cautious when clicking on links: Be wary of links, especially those that come from unknown sources. Avoid clicking on links that promise freebies or ask for personal information. 

5. Keep your software updated: Make sure your devices are always up-to-date with the latest security patches to protect against malware and viruses. 

6. Use multi-factor authentication: Consider using a second factor of authentication, such as a text message or phone call, to add an extra layer of security to your account.
